summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating the deployment retry marker file (frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt). No evidence in the diff summary of functional application code changes; however, two additional non-requested files were modified (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json to add/update project tracking metadata (e.g., new_feature_requests/known_issues)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the deployment retry marker file; updating project tracking metadata was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (updated summaries of many frontend files)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request updating documentation/summary artifacts; only deploy-retry.txt needed changing to trigger redeploy.
